title: Van Aert, Vollering, and the Cobblestone Crunch: Omloop and ‘Opening Weekend’ Mega-Guide
content:
The road to Flanders and Roubaix begins with cycling's greatest double-header. Here are the courses, storylines, startlists, and TV schedules for Omloop, Kuurne, and Hageland.

Read the full article at Van Aert, Vollering, and the Cobblestone Crunch: Omloop and ‘Opening Weekend’ Mega-Guide on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
